changelog.release_notes: Date, seconds, exact minute positions, tap gesture, more color options.
Added a battery indicator (by changing color (only in Basalt) or a text with the percentage).
Hopefully fixed the issues that made it fail on start.
V1.1: More colors to be configured, some bugs and animations fixed. Now the BlueTooth status can be shown by changing colors of one of three items (background, disc or minute hand)
V1.0: Does nothing more than showing the hour, but with some basic visual customizations for both Aplite and Basalt systems.

data.description:
A minimalistic analog watchface that will show only the actual hour and the minute hand.

It can be fully customized, the options include:
· Bluetooth status, it can be shown with an icon or by changing the color of some element.
· Battery, shown with a percentage (it can be hidden unless it goes under some level) or by changing the color of some element.
· All elements of the watchface can be customized with any of the 64 colors of Pebble Time.
· Fully modifiable date format and position.
· Seconds and exact minute positions can be shown.
· Shake your wrist to show some of the information (you can choose what and for how long).

This idea comes from a post in Reddit by the user joeytitans, where he posted an image of a real wallclock with a rotating disc that only shows the current hour.

Special thanks to Reddit users PiwwowPants and Limp1 that helped me test on real devices and sent pictures of it.
